title: Discuss amongst yourselves
author: VD
content_html:
I know, I am sure we all know, that you are very busy, but I have been looking forward to your “discuss amongst yourselves” opportunity this week. Will you be able to post it soon?

Sorry, I should have posted it last night, but I was a little distracted….
